abstract: Separate studies led by Dr Robert A Holt and Dr Matthew Meyerson find link between Fusobacterium, bacterium that is not particularly prevalent in colon, and colon cancer; studies are published together online in journal Genome Research.
snippet: An unexpected finding: A bacterium never particularly prevalent in the colon seems to have an affinity for colon cancers.
lead_paragraph: An unexpected finding: A bacterium never particularly prevalent in the colon seems to have an affinity for colon cancers.

headline.main: Two Cancer Studies Find Bacterial Clue in Colon
headline.print_headline: Two Cancer Studies Find Bacterial Clue in Colon
headline.seo: Separate Cancer Studies, but a Single Suspicion of Bacteria
